dmca.title: [EV1-C1557608N] Copyright
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal . Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. ________________________________ From: PPI - Abuse [mailto:abusenet@gmail.com] Posted At: Friday, October 27, 2006 3:52 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1557608N] Copyright Subject: Fwd: [EV1-C1557608N] Copyright ---------- Forwarded message ---------- From: abuse@ev1.net Date: 27/10/2006 09:22 Subject: [EV1-C1557608N] Copyright To: abusenet@gmail.com Reference: [EV1-C1557608N] copyright@theplanet.com is the clearinghouse for all copyright infringement reports. Your email is being sent to our legal counsel at the address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration. You may find their direct contact information at this URL: http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ -- Regards, Abuse Department The Planet - EV1Servers http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html http://ev1servers.net/About/aup.aspx http://ev1servers.net/About/tos.aspx http://www.ev1.net/english/about/aup.asp http://www.ev1.net/english/about/tos.asp / ==== Original Message ==== 1. helo=ug-out-1314.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 26 Oct 2006 13:29: 28.0719 (UTC) FILETIME=[C33921F0:01C6F902] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Hello Provider, Intellectual Property Infringement Policy Customers may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or otherwise store on a Server any information, data, material, or work that infringes the intellectual property rights of others. The Planet has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998. The Planet reserves the right to suspend permanently or terminate the Services of any Customer that repeatedly violates The Planet's Intellectual Property Infringement Policy or any copyright law. The site HOMEMDEACO.COM.BR: DomainTypeClassTTLAnswer homemdeaco.com.br.AIN14400 74.52.46.19 homemdeaco.com.br.NSIN86400ns1.heim.com.br . homemdeaco.com.br.NSIN86400ns2.heim.com.br. The homemdeaco.com.br page houses links of complete films, shows, albums of musics with copyright and is violating all the possible articles on piracy. This site is a crime and will be processing and entering in Justice for any company who to insist on housing it. Please, shutdown the server. MIME element (text/html)
Hello Provider,
 
Intellectual Property Infringement Policy
Customers may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or otherwise
store on a Server any information, data, material, or work that
infringes the intellectual property rights of others. The Planet has
the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the
extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998.
The Planet reserves the right to suspend permanently or terminate the Services of
any Customer that repeatedly violates The Planet's Intellectual
Property Infringement Policy or any copyright law.


The site HOMEMDEACO.COM.BR:
